header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Brownies and sexism, Twitter, The Boy in the Dress, gender confusion, food for tea
header.activity: Family talking about Brownies, gender confusion

body.u: so we're gonna talk about Brownies today cos what was your erm earlier question ?
was it is Brownies
hang on a minute you want to start you're desperate to start the conversation go on?
no I I was just reminding you that it's gonna be Brownies
yes I know it's Brownies today but what were you saying earlier?
is Brownies illegal?
illegal? now why do you why were you asking? what's your issue with it?
erm because it's sexist and that's against the law
and why is it sexist?
cos they don't allow boys
cos they don't allow boys so it is an interesting issue actually isn't it?
mm

cos if it was the other way around people would be possibly up in arms and saying this is real sexism and girlgirls should be allowed to join Scouts and things and they are now allowed to do that but and it hasn't worked the other way around has it?
no
and the Brownies' website does promote it saying that girls prefer the fact that there are no boys but erm if you feel very strongly about it we could write a letter and make it public
right I'm going to ask some people erm who if they would prefer it if there were boys or not in Brownies?
you're going to ask the Brownies themselves?
yeah see if the Brownies

but to be honest with you it's irrelevant if they that's not a legitimate thing cos you can't have you know people in a workplace saying well I don't really want girls in there they have to allow girls don't they and boys in society? so it is in fact very sexist that Brownies doesn't allow boys
yeah

but I'm just saying if you wanna make an issue about it we could write an open letter and put it on Twitter or something to see what they might suggest I think in all I think perhaps most boys won't want to do Brownies but that's not the point if you wanted you're gonna spill garlic butter everywhere put that tray down
there's barely any
no there's hardly any
but but if you want to join Brownies and do the activities that they do then perhaps you should be allowed
I may not want to but
yeah but I think you do don't you?
yeah I do but
mm
I just wanted I just wanted so
you to be yeah
yeah I just want boys to be allowed to join Brownies
I've yes but I think we could really only pursue it if you if you did actually personally want to do it because perhaps nobody wants to join Brownies perhaps no boy wants to join Brownies
I'll ask some of my class

or they've not really thought about it but I think if you made an issue about it then that other boys would start to think ooh actually yes I like the things that they do in Brownies stop doing that you know and I'd like to join in but you know I feel that if we manage to get the the rules changed or whatever and then you said well I don't want to do it I think it would be a bit of a shame if they'd had to sort of go through all the you know fuss about it do you see what I mean?
yeah

you shouldn't have to to do it or join it as justification for getting them to change the rules I mean if you like you can just make a statement saying that it is that you feel it's sexist in fact if you want I can film you saying this and I can put it on Youtube if you prefer?
I think Twister would be better because
you think Twister? Twitter?
Twitter might be better
well I can also put Youtube stuff on Twitter but you'd prefer a letter?
yeah
so what what are your thoughts do you want to to do that?
if it really gets into my head and then I and then I probably will

cos I know you've been quite upset about it on and off since joined erm and understandably so and I think you'll probably be quite upset when we all do the Brownies ice cream parlour and have an amazing time but erm
although there is one thing
mm
that's a problem
mm
will you be able to afford it?
to do for you to do Brownies as well?
mm
I'd find a way of making it happen
also you don't do drama you don't do diving
you don't do diving any more
what do you do?
yeah yeah
chess
chess and football football
mm but
but chess doesn't cost me any money
like like out of school what do you do after school?
yeah
I do Brownies drama and ballet
yes
okay Brownies drama and ballet
BGB

oh yeah well you're not doing any drama lessons at the moment so but the question is do I mean we've talked about this before haven't we? in fact I saw something in a magazine and I took a photograph off today there's a senior army officer who joined the army as a man and then realised that she wants to become a woman
hey

so she's now become a woman erm because there are people that feel that they're born in the wrong body or there are mainly men it doesn't really work the other way around that er don't want to change sex but they do want to wear ladies' clothes
like David Walliams
like David Walliams yeah or there's Grayson Perry
the erm the Grand Central boy did
the Grand Central boy? the boy in the dress?
yeah
yes that's right
there's also a film called The Boy in the Dress
ah erm yeah
The Boy in the Dress is basically a life story about David Walliams

well it sort of is and he he c he likes boys and girls as a in fact so I think what I'm asking you and we're not really sure is if you know do you want to be a Brownie because you'd like to be a girl or do you just want to join in and do what they do cos you like their activities?
well apparently they're gonna go kayaking and it's just seems like a lot
punting
punting
punting they're going to go punting
but it just seems like so but Brownies just seems like so much more fun than er Scouts is it?
yes I think you definitely would prefer Brownies to Scouts
yeah and to Beavers
yeah but is that like is that just because of the activities themselves? do you want to become a Br do y or you do you just not know the reasons why?
I do not know the reasons why
yeah okay
that's why it had such a big impact in my life

well I don't want you to get upset about it this is just it's just a very complicated issue isn't it? there's absolutely no need to be worried if you're confused cos you're only nine and a half so er it's perfectly natural to not to not know how you feel isn't it? some some grown-ups don't quite know how they feel about these issues
mm
erm and we've we've sort of we have decided to be sisters together haven't we sometimes?
sisters
sisters together
that we could all dress up in dresses and go out and stuff
yeah
which would be lovely and you've got erm a dress well playsuit and you look lovely in it
and you can be my girlfriend when if you want to be a girl
yeah I just want you
because
to be happy and h feel comfortable in your own skin that's the most important thing
so the whole kind of other sexual stuff is gonna come later but I still think we should make erm an issue about the Brownies thing
really?
because it is it is sexist and I think their argument on the website saying oh it's nice to have somewhere to go where there aren't any boys I've I personally find that quite offensive
yeah
it's rude isn't it?
I
because you'd never be able to say that of as a boy
yeah
you know?
yeah if it if there was a boy saying oh I love this place there's absolutely no girls there
everyone would attack them wouldn't they? yeah
yeah everyone would be like oi that's against the law
yeah they'd say well they'd say it would be very sesexist
yeah
mm so I think
just
I'll find out who the head of the Brownies is and I will write to them about it
do Brown Owl
no no of the entire well of the whole country
the queen?
well
the queen is not in charge of Brownies
well the person did tell you
the person did tell me? would you like to be a little bit more specific?
yeah
like the person told you that I was really good at Brownies remember? and she gave you a little phone call on the like a texty?
what? a little phone call little do you mean?
little phone
yes from Brownies
there is somebody not the whole of the country there's someone in
I mean that she was the whole of the country
well we haven't met her which one are you talking about?
she texted you
nobody's texted me to say that you were brilliant
can we also complain to the people in the law so even so if Brownies doesn't do it then it might need to shut down because if it's sexist?

well I think that would be a bit harsh but I think we will start with a campaign where we even where we contact the Brownies' head directly and then if we're not happy with what they say then we'll go public on Twitter

yeah and if and then if we're still not happy loads of people are going oh no no no it's brilliant that there's loads of places there's finding a place where there's no boys and just girls then it then we might need to go to the head the people in the law
well yes which well that would cost money so it would be a bit tricky but they might decide that you could be an honorary Brownie in for example
yeah er I'll ask my friends if they want if they wouldn't mind if they became a Brownie
yeah that would be interesting take a poll
because I'd like to have some friends there
well you've got loads of friends you've got and and
yeah I think quite a few people have a crush on me
mm mm mm mm
it's possible
and you've got your sister
yeah
is that what you wanted to say?
mm
yes
but I do want some like friends that are boys cos it would be a bit awkward if there was
it wouldn't be awkward at all if you were the only boy
I have to do my promise night
well why would that be awkward? I could be there with you and hold your hand if you wanted?
no I was just wondering cos I'd like to do the dancing dancing dancing
can you just speak properly sorry?
what's for dessert?
I love that your ex high expectation erm well there's Frubes or strawberries cos you've eaten all the other stuff there's not jelly because there was a tiny bit and that's gone now in my tummy
I said
erm
I said wewe've eaten all of the jelly
there's grapes and strawberries and if you have some of that erm I I think there's some ice cream still isn't there?
Frubies
what would you like ?
well I'm looking as you've been bragging me about for a long time
that I've been what whating you about? ragging you about?
bragging
bragging you about that doesn't work
no like going de de de
begging you? well it's driving me mad that there's an Easter Lindt little baby bunny and one marshmallow from all those weeks ago just sitting there uneaten
and I I've got
and you've got what?
fine I'll eat it
good eat the damn thing
no I'm gonna eat the piece of chocolate not the bunny

I'm not so interested about the bu the marshmallow I just I want the Lindt bunny I'm not joking if you've not eaten it by Friday then when you're at dad's this weekend I I'm going to eat it I don't I won't all my willpower will have run out no you can't hide it because you're not allowed to have food out of the kitchen come back cos we're doing a recording
no I don't
eat that come back
come back sit down
sit down what are you going to eat for for your dessert as you so grandly call it?
company
there's ice cream
you're not having chocolate ice cream you can have some fruit first
can I have some crisps?
no those are from 's lunch that he didn't eat all of them
I didn't even have my crisps cos they were horrible
can you sit down please?
my crisps were horrible
I'm just gonna pause this cos you're
I'm gonna have some strawberries
you're just messing around now
I'll have some strawberries mum
